name: ManyWorlds Project: World 10.0.5 - Increasing-Limited-Trivial-Artificial-Central-Transformative-Local
description: The Many Worlds Project is loosely based on the Manoa School approach to Alternative Futures generation. More information about this project available on kairosa.art. 10% of resale proceeds will go to a Hawaiian Language and Culture charter school pool. Distributed annually across all DOE recognized programs. ~Kairosa | Resolution 2000x2000
